**Wikipedia summary**:  
<p class="mw-empty-elt">

</p>
<p><i><b>Typha angustifolia</b></i> L. (also <b>lesser bulrush</b>, <b>narrowleaf cattail</b> or <b>lesser reedmace</b>) is a perennial herbaceous plant of genus <i>Typha</i>. This cattail is an "obligate wetland" species that is commonly found in the northern hemisphere in brackish locations.</p>
